Mod.name: Moldos Arsenal
Mod.description:
A collection of wands/weapons/items from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3093591071]Tales of Kupoli[/url]. Why? I've decided to split Tales into 2 different mods as a remaster and internal rewrite of sorts.
Discord: https://discord.gg/FKaRA9HMUq
